revised_title: Development of Teeth in Elasmobranch Fishes and Teleostei
tldr: The authors study the development of teeth in Elasmobranch Fishes and Teleostei, focusing on the unique process of tooth formation in these species. They describe the stages of dental development, the role of enamel-organ, and the differences in tooth formation between these fish groups and mammals. The research provides valuable insights into the evolution of teeth and dental development in vertebrates.
